Working families deserve a @CFPB that will get the tricks & traps out of credit cards & other financial products – & stand up to big banks, credit card & fintech companies when they cheat & discriminate. I’ll keep fighting to hold the CFPB accountable until it does its job.

In the 2 yrs they’ve controlled @CFPB, @MickMulvaneyOMB & @CFPBDirector have gutted its fair lending office, stripped it of exam & enforcement powers, & failed to file even 1 equal credit enforcement action. Could it be that banks know they can discriminate without consequences?

Access to millions of patient records gives @Google a huge resource to build AI systems & other tech – especially in light of news that Google is trying to buy Fitbit. Regulators & medical experts are right to have big privacy & competition concerns. https://www.theguardian.com/technology/2019/nov/12/google-medical-data-project-nightingale-secret-transfer-us-health-information …

Medical records are extremely sensitive info that, when mishandled, expose patients to embarrassment, discrimination, & exploitation. Based on @Google’s prior privacy violations & security failures, we need to know how they’re handling patient data & for what purposes.

I'm concerned by reports that @Google collected personal health information from 50 million Americans without their consent. @SenBlumenthal, @SenBillCassidy & I want Google to explain “Project Nightingale” & how they’re planning to use this private data. https://www.reuters.com/article/us-google-health-congress/u-s-lawmakers-question-google-about-collection-of-health-records-idUSKBN1XU2PH …

The last thing our country needs is more Too Big To Fail banks. They put our entire economy – and working families – at risk.  https://www.reuters.com/article/us-suntrust-banks-m-a-bb-and-t-fed/u-s-fed-approves-merger-between-bbt-suntrust-banks-idUSKBN1XT2P3 …

Everyone has a right to live in a safe & affordable home. I’m glad to join @NydiaVelazquez’s bold effort to invest $70B in the Public Housing Capital Fund to wipe out the backlog of public housing maintenance & repairs caused by years of underfunding. https://www.warren.senate.gov/newsroom/press-releases/senator-warren-introduces-senate-companion-bill-to-ensure-our-nations-public-housing-is-healthy-and-safe …
Glad the #HongKongHumanRightsDemocracyAct passed the Senate. I’m proud to be a cosponsor of this bill, which strengthens support for human rights & democracy in Hong Kong.

I’m concerned about private equity firms' investment in industries like nursing homes that care for seniors & people with disabilities & rely on government Medicaid & Medicare funding. That’s why I’ve got a bill to #StopWallStreetLooting & hold private equity firms accountable.

For-profit nursing home chains owned by private equity firms have more health & safety problems that put residents at risk. And the complicated ownership structure makes it hard for families to hold these homes legally liable for bad care.  #StopWallStreetLooting

Private equity firms have made big investments in big for-profit nursing home chains. @SenSherrodBrown, @RepMarkPocan & I are investigating their role in the declining quality of nursing home care. #StopWallStreetLooting https://www.washingtonpost.com/business/economy/opioid-overdoses-bedsores-and-broken-bones-what-happened-when-a-private-equity-firm-sought-profits-in-caring-for-societys-most-vulnerable/2018/11/25/09089a4a-ed14-11e8-baac-2a674e91502b_story.html …

Sorry for interrupting the party, @HHSGov – but before we spend more money to hang his portrait, can we get answers to our questions about whether Tom Price paid back taxpayers for his wrongful use of private jets on the taxpayer’s dime?  https://www.warren.senate.gov/oversight/letters/warren-murray-and-wyden-demand-update-from-trump-administration-on-the-recovery-of-341000-in-taxpayer-funds-spent-on-lavish-travel-by-former-hhs-secretary-tom-price … https://twitter.com/ddiamond/status/1196806648263827457 …

Here’s the bottom line: private equity firms are putting millions of workers at risk by loading up companies with debt, stripping assets, & collecting huge fees. If the bets go bad, they walk away. I’ll keep fighting to #StopWallStreetLooting & hold private equity accountable.

Ernst & Young’s industry-funded report paints a dishonest picture about private equity's effect on our economy. For example, when EY calculated private equity-owned companies’ avg wages, they included their Wall Street investors’ fat paychecks to skew the numbers. pic.twitter.com/VOJGthXyFi

Private equity will do anything to kill my #StopWallStreetLooting Act – even funding a sham study by Ernst & Young to defend the industry. @RepMarkPocan, @RepJayapal, @SenatorBaldwin, @SenSanders, & I want EY to explain their report's glaring flaws. https://www.cnbc.com/2019/11/18/elizabeth-warren-bernie-sanders-call-report-defending-private-equity-a-sham.html …

Toys “R” Us. Radio Shack. Payless Shoes. Sports Authority. Mervyn’s. Shopko. For far too long, private equity firms have destroyed retail stores & killed jobs, hurt workers, & drained our economy. We must #StopWallStreetLooting – & I have a bill for that. https://www.forbes.com/sites/mayrarodriguezvalladares/2019/11/14/significant-retail-job-losses-at-private-equity-backed-companies-should-worry-us/#5109b1e15128 …

It’s true: our student loan system IS fundamentally broken. That’s why @WhipClyburn & I have a bill to cancel student loan debt for 42 million Americans. Our bill will help close the racial wealth gap & end the student debt crisis. #CancelMyDebt

Dr. Johnson says that “repayment trends suggest much of the [student loan] debt will likely never be repaid,” but @BetsyDeVosED refuses to lift a finger to help our students. If @usedgov is sitting on info confirming Dr. Johnson's conclusions, the public deserves to see it.

Last month, one of @BetsyDeVosED’s top student loan advisors abruptly resigned, called the student loan system “fundamentally broken,” & announced his support for student debt cancellation. @WhipClyburn & I want to know how he came to that conclusion. https://www.politico.com/news/2019/11/14/top-devos-aides-departure-prompts-inquiry-from-democrats-070883 …

Before the @FCC approved the deal, T-Mobile execs spent $195k at Trump Hotels. This is what corruption looks like, & working families pay the price. My bill to #EndCorruptionNow would reduce the stranglehold that giant companies have over our government.

The US has a monopoly problem. In industry after industry, giant corporations get to play by their own political & economic rules, amassing unchecked power over people’s lives. And our government regulators would rather kiss up to them than use their tools to uphold the law.

The @FCC’s final approval of the T-Mobile/Sprint merger officially hands control of nearly 100% of wireless services to 3 corporate giants – strangling competition & harming consumers, workers, & small businesses. https://techcrunch.com/2019/11/05/fcc-approves-t-mobile-sprint-merger-despite-serious-concerns/ …

Drug breakthroughs don’t happen by magic – they’re the result of generations of taxpayer investments. But in 2018, @NIH could only fund 20% of its research apps. The Medical Innovation Act is a powerful way to invest in the basic research that will save lives. #NIHSwearJar

My bill requires giant drug companies that produce billion-dollar drugs & enter federal settlements to reinvest a portion of their profits in @NIH research as a condition of the settlement. I call it the #NIHSwearJar: if a drug company follows the rules, it won't pay the fee.

Giant drug companies caught breaking the law often get off with slap-on-the-wrist settlements. I’m reintroducing my Medical Innovation Act with @PeterWelch to increase @NIH & @US_FDA research funding by holding big pharma accountable. #NIHSwearJar

This is disgraceful. Federal funding for Historically Black Colleges & Universities expired more than a month ago, & @SenAlexander just rejected the #FUTUREAct to restore this critical funding. Again. Senate Republicans need to stop the games & fund our HBCUs & MSIs NOW. https://twitter.com/SenatorCardin/status/1191757613979099136 …

I’m especially proud to recognize Deborah Sampson from Plympton, MA, who disguised herself as a man to fight in the Revolutionary War & was the only woman to earn a Revolutionary Army military pension. Women veterans like Deborah Sampson should be honored for their service.

Women veterans are tough, smart, & have made incredible sacrifices for our country. We can admit vulnerable populations fleeing persecution & violence while keeping our country secure, healthy & prosperous. It’s not an either/or proposition. https://thehill.com/homenews/administration/468761-trump-approves-plan-for-record-lower-number-of-refugee-admissions …

My office found that a sanctioned Russian company with Putin ties received a tariff exemption, & most exemptions go to foreign-owned companies. The tariff exclusion process is one more way the Trump admin works for big, well-connected, & in many cases, foreign-owned companies.

The @CommerceOIG report concluded: the Trump administration’s process for reviewing steel & aluminum tariff exemptions “is neither transparent nor objective.” In fact, the decisions “give the appearance that the Department officials may not be impartial.”

Starting last August, I asked the @CommerceOIG to investigate @CommerceGov’s seemingly arbitrary & opaque process for exempting companies from Trump’s steel & aluminum tariffs. Their new report back confirms: the process was rigged from the start. https://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-trade-steel/u-s-handling-of-tariffs-raises-appearance-of-improper-influence-watchdog-idUSKBN1X92KP …
